snippet.title: Game Boy Color - Midway presents Arcade Hits - Spy Hunter © 1999 Midway - Gameplay
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
Now, all the fun and excitement of the past are here in glorious Game Boy Color! Whether you're reliving your glory days or discovering these hits for the first time, Midway's Arcade Classics are sure to be favorites for all ages!

- Take on enemy agents with your collection of top-secret weapons! Machine guns, missiles, smoke screens and oil slicks are the norm in this espionage adventure!
- Lock and load! Replenish your arsenal inside the weapons van! Watch while it comes to your rescue in deadly situations!

- It's Lunar Madness! Navigate your buggy across the vast terrain of the moon while leaping bottomless craters and avoiding monstrous boulders!
- X-terminate! From flying UFOs and group patrols, to hiding crater aliens, you're not alone on this barren wasteland!
